reference_name: 14K Yellow Gold "Always In My Heart" Photo Locket

input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "PicturesOnGold"
Reference Product Name: "14K Yellow Gold "Always In My Heart" Photo Locket"
Reference Product Description:
Have a special someone in mind and want to show them? This Always In My Heart Photo Locket is the perfect gift idea for them!

Photo lockets are especially popular these days. Pictures can paint a thousand words and this is a beautiful idea to immortalize your love!
Lockets all come with clear protective coverings for the photo on the inside.
You can add hair to your locket by removing the plastic inserts then inserting them back.
Your locket can have a picture permanently lasered inside or a photo print that fits perfectly. Alternatively you can also add your own photo prints at home.
You can engrave your locket with a personalized message engraving, initial or even monogram
How Many Photos Can This Locket Hold? Up to 2 Photos
What Shape is This Locket? Heart
Is a Chain Included? You can choose which chain to add to your order when checking out

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Things Remembered Pave Padlock Heart Locket Necklace'
  - Name='Personalized Memorial Photo Necklace'
  - Name='Rope Edge Photo & Initial Charms Necklace 10K'
  - Name='Engravable Sentiments Necklace (3 Lines)'
  - Name='14K Gold Engravable Photo Perforated Heart Cross'
  - Name='Personalized Engraved Round Gold Necklace'
  - Name='14K Gold Engravable Photo Family Tree Swivel Disc Pendant'
  - Name='Zales 1 ct. T.W. Diamond Dog Tag Pendant in 10K Gold'
  - Name='PicturesOnGold.com Always & Forever In My Heart Photo Locket'
  - Name='Personalized Heart Locket Photo Necklace'
  - Name='Personalized Heart Locket Necklace with Photo'
  - Name='Personalized Heart Locket Necklace'
  - Name='Handmade Stainless Heart Locket Necklace with Real Pressed Flowers'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Heart Locket Necklace'
  - Name='Custom Photo Locket Necklace'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Things Remembered Pave Padlock Heart Locket Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a heart-shaped locket necklace, similar in silhouette and purpose; the 'padlock' feature suggests a decorative variation, but still a photo locket type.
This product is a photo necklace intended for memorial purposes; likely similar in function although shape and material are unclear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rope Edge Photo & Initial Charms Necklace 10K
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Contains photo element and initial charms, but described more as charms than a heart-shaped locket; less similar in silhouette.
Focuses on engraving of sentiments on a necklace; lacks mention of photo locket or heart shape, so less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 14K Gold Engravable Photo Perforated Heart Cross
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Has a heart shape and engraving/photo feature but combined with cross shape, making it more specialized and less purely a heart locket.
Round shape differs from reference heart shape; engraving present but unclear if photo locket style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 14K Gold Engravable Photo Family Tree Swivel Disc Pendant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Engravable photo pendant, but disc shape and family tree design differ from heart-shaped locket.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales 1 ct. T.W. Diamond Dog Tag Pendant in 10K Gold
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dog tag pendant distinct in shape and style; diamond accent and no photo locket feature noted.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PicturesOnGold.com Always & Forever In My Heart Photo Locket
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Matches reference brand and nearly identical product name; full photo locket, heart-shaped, with engravingsâ€”essentially identical.
Clear heart-shaped locket with photo function and personalization, very similar to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Heart Locket Necklace with Photo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a heart locket with photo insertion and personalization, closely matching reference product features.
Heart-shaped locket with personalization implied, though photo feature is less explicit but likely included.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Handmade Stainless Heart Locket Necklace with Real Pressed Flowers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Heart-shaped locket but made of stainless steel instead of gold; includes pressed flowers, which is a decorative difference from photo focus.
Clearly a heart locket necklace with photo and personalization, very relevant to the reference.
Custom photo locket necklace, but shape and materials unspecified, so likely a locket but less precise match to heart shape and gold material.
